statements: DELETE FROM aquaculture_tanks WHERE tank_id = 100 AND tank_type = 'saltwater';
DELETE FROM filtration_processes WHERE filter_id IN (SELECT filter_id FROM aquaculture_tanks WHERE tank_type = 'freshwater') AND process_status = 'completed';
DELETE FROM OxygenLevels WHERE tank_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM aquaculture_tanks WHERE tank_id = 123 AND tank_capacity > 1000;
DELETE FROM oxygen_levels WHERE date_recorded < '2021-12-31' OR oxygen_level < 5;
DELETE FROM OxygenLevels WHERE tank_id = 3 AND oxygen_level < 5.0;
